item.title: Pathtracer Devlog
item.description: This post is a devlog for my pathtracer-playground project. In this project I am seeing how far I can get in writing a physically based pathtracer using WebGPU. Render fullscreen quad 2023-10-30 After 1000 lines of WebGPU plumbing code, the pt executable contains A GpuContext for initializing the WebGPU instance, surface, adapter, device, queue, and the swap chain. A distinct Renderer which initializes a render pipeline, a uniform and vertex buffer, using the GpuContext.
